com.sitewhere.spi.device

Interface IAssignmentStateManager

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ILifecycleComponent, ITenantLifecycleComponent

    public interface IAssignmentStateManager
extends ITenantLifecycleComponent
    Manages concurrent updates to assignment state to prevent thrashing as the result of high event throughput with state updates.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods
